result.purpose: Responsible for managing a pool of workers to process jobs concurrently.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating worker management and job processing functionalities.

pkg/worker/config.go.purpose: Defines configuration settings for the worker package.

pkg/worker/dispatcher.go.purpose: Implements a dispatcher that manages a pool of workers to process jobs concurrently.

pkg/worker/job.go.purpose: Defines a Job struct that holds a function to execute.

pkg/worker/worker.go.purpose: Defines a Worker struct that manages job execution in a worker pool.
